tools.name: Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)
tools.description: Install WSL 2 for running Linux distributions on Windows. Enables seamless Linux development environment.
tools.post_install_message: WSL installed successfully! A restart is required. After restarting, install a Linux distribution from the Microsoft Store (e.g., Ubuntu).

tools.name: Git for Windows
tools.description: Install Git version control system with Git Bash, Git GUI, and shell integration.
tools.post_install_message: Git installed successfully! You may need to restart your terminal or IDE to use git commands.

tools.name: Python (Latest)
tools.description: Install the latest Python 3 interpreter with pip package manager and standard library.
tools.post_install_message: Python installed successfully! Restart your terminal to use python and pip commands. Add Python to PATH if not automatically configured.

tools.name: Node.js (LTS)
tools.description: Install Node.js LTS version with npm package manager for JavaScript development.
tools.post_install_message: Node.js installed successfully! Restart your terminal to use node and npm commands.

tools.name: Windows Terminal
tools.description: Install modern Windows Terminal with tabs, split panes, and GPU-accelerated text rendering.
tools.post_install_message: Windows Terminal installed successfully! Launch it from the Start menu or pin it to your taskbar.

tools.name: Visual Studio Code
tools.description: Install Visual Studio Code, a lightweight but powerful source code editor with extensive extensions.
tools.post_install_message: Visual Studio Code installed successfully! Launch from Start menu or use 'code' command in terminal after restart.

tools.name: PowerShell 7
tools.description: Install PowerShell 7, the latest cross-platform PowerShell with improved performance and new features.
tools.post_install_message: PowerShell 7 installed successfully! Use 'pwsh' command to launch PowerShell 7.

tools.name: Docker Desktop
tools.description: Install Docker Desktop for containerized application development. Requires WSL 2 to be installed first.
tools.post_install_message: Docker Desktop installed successfully! A restart is recommended. Make sure WSL 2 is installed and enabled.

tools.name: Windows Package Manager (winget)
tools.description: Update or install Windows Package Manager (winget) - the official Windows package manager.
tools.post_install_message: Winget updated successfully! Winget is now ready to install and manage packages.

tools.name: Chocolatey Package Manager
tools.description: Install Chocolatey, a popular package manager for Windows with thousands of packages.
tools.post_install_message: Chocolatey installed successfully! Restart your terminal and use 'choco' command to manage packages.

tools.name: 7-Zip
tools.description: High compression ratio file archiver. Supports most archive formats including 7z, ZIP, RAR, GZIP, and TAR.

tools.name: VLC Media Player
tools.description: Free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as DVDs, Audio CDs, VCDs, and various streaming protocols.

tools.name: Brave Browser
tools.description: Privacy-focused web browser that blocks ads and trackers by default. Fast, secure, and built on Chromium.

tools.name: Discord
tools.description: All-in-one voice and text chat for gamers that's free, secure, and works on both your desktop and phone.

tools.name: HWiNFO64
tools.description: Professional hardware information and diagnostic tool for Windows. Provides detailed hardware analysis, monitoring, and reporting.

tools.name: CPU-Z
tools.description: A freeware that gathers information on some of the main devices of your system (CPU, Motherboard, Memory, etc.).
